title: Refreshed Fitness Center, New Stylish and Insulating Roofing, Range
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-Satellite', '-Jacuzzi', '-Professional Bilingual Staff', '-Newly Renovated Kitchens With Quartz Countertops, New Cabinets, and Stainless Steel Appliances', '-New Fully Renovated Interiors!', '-Updated Lavish Landscaping', '-New Stylish and Insulating Roofing', '-Newly Painted Exteriors', '-Night Patrol', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
